members.name: TYPE
members.comment: URI that identifies the SignatureProperties element (this can be specified as the value of the type parameter of the Reference class to identify the referent's type).

members.name: getId
members.comment: Returns the Id of this SignatureProperties.

return: the Id of this SignatureProperties (or null if not specified)

members.name: getProperties
members.comment: Returns an unmodifiable list of one or more SignaturePropertys that are contained in this SignatureProperties.

return: an unmodifiable list of one or more SignaturePropertys

name: javax.xml.crypto.dsig.SignatureProperties
